segments.text: Can I be of any help ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have a fifteen-day vacation and I want to have a trip to England . Is there any route that fits me well ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , of course . How about this one ? It's a new route .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's wonderful . By the way , what kind of cabin will I have ?
segments.speaker: S2
